name: Project Doramu +
description:
A taiko simulator that allows for a variety of different mods to customize the experience.

Easy/Hard: Change the timing window to be stricter or lenient
Fast/Slow: Change the playback speed to play at a pace that you'd like
TaikoMania: Play the game as a familiar piano rhythm game
NoteToTrack: Play with scrolling speeds that can go crazy.
Squid Beatz: Skin the game to look like a certain minigame.
